snippet: Pacifico, imported from Mexico and popular among California surfers, is running its first major national advertising campaign as it broadens its distribution across the United States.
lead_paragraph: Pacifico, imported from Mexico and popular among California surfers, is running its first major national advertising campaign as it broadens its distribution across the United States.

headline.seo: Pacifico Beer Rides a Social Media Wave in U.S.
headline.main: A Mexican Beer Rides a Social Media Wave
headline.print_headline: A Mexican Beer Rides a Social Media Wave
